> > @AdamWr `@zloyden` can you reproduce on that dood.re iframe page?
> 
> Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
> 
> If issue sometimes occurs and sometimes not, then I guess that it might be iOS/Safari related issue where some rules are applied too late and due to this don't work. For example, similar issue was here - [#108226 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/108226#issuecomment-1098870812) on every other platforms popups were blocked correctly, but on iOS (the same with Safari extension) sometimes were blocked, sometimes not, and it looks like iOS/Safari extensions issue.

Hello??????

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
